products.title: Tropical Leaves Pebble Roman Blind
products.description: This tropical leaves pebble design brings to life the beauty of costa rica and the caribbean. The ornamental leafy pattern is picked out in a monochromatic palette that highlights each exotic outline. The mix of greys and neutrals is also incredibly easy to incorporate into your this tropical leaves pebble design brings to life the beauty of costa rica and the caribbean.

products.title: Leaf Pewter Roman Blind
products.description: What else would you expect from a design named leaf than, well, a leaf? This design goes big and bold with it, making a huge statement across the fabric - nature is here. And it does it in the most stylish way possible with a light grey background that feels cosy yet also ultr what else would you expect from a design named leaf than, well, a leaf? This design goes big and bold with it, making a huge statement across the fabric - nature is here.

products.title: Splash Hessian
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open and close the blind, beaded chain to tilt louvres. products.title: Fagel Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: Their fagel range will add the cosy feel to your home. This range comes in many colours which would suit any room. Revamp your home with the soft fabric and lovely colour of the fagel charcoal roman blind. Product id: db-arom0526 fabric colour: charcoal material: 52% polyester 48% cotton control type: sidewinder chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes fagel charcoal roman blind in grey.

products.title: Ahisma Luxe Faux Silk Slate & Mineral Trimmed Roman Blind
products.description: Lovely, luxurious faux silk in a rich and commanding slate grey is always going to make your home feel stylish and sophisticated. Add to that a fun decorative trim and the look is complete. The sleek finish of the ahisma fabric, with little slubs for texture, look incredibly opul lovely, luxurious faux silk in a rich and commanding slate grey is always going to make your home feel stylish and sophisticated.
